```

Block 15000000 on 01 Jul 07:35, 22.5 seconds per block
```

author: tokey1475
content: for anyone interested.  The method I used to get these numbers was to collect the blocktime and uncle status of the last 10k mainnet blocks and randomly sample them one block at a time for input into the difficulty calculation using the scaled blocktime (based on predicted parent diff/sampled difficulty)
